allow: Bash(docker exec timescaledb psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "SELECT bucket, open, high, low, close, volume FROM price_1min ORDER BY bucket DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(docker exec timescaledb psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as row_count FROM price_1d;")
Bash(docker exec timescaledb psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "SELECT bucket, open, high, low, close, ROUND(volume::numeric, 2) as volume FROM price_1d ORDER BY bucket DESC LIMIT 5;")
